actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage a strong community-based banking system.
short_title: Community Savings and Investment Act of 1999

summary.text: Community Savings and Investment Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish a separate tax rate for a qualified community lender; and (2) permit the exclusion from gross income of distressed community banking income.

titles.title: Community Savings and Investment Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage a strong community-based banking system.
